Author: amy-shakes
Text: when i was dating someone she would think i faked my ed because sometimes i would be like this so i just fasted anytime we weren’t together

Author: lipstickwoes
Text: I sort of do this, but consciously? Like it’s almost like I’ve gotten decent at bargaining with it? Like, I want people to think I’m okay, and they’re already suspicious, so when my parents visit, I’ll eat semi normally for a day or two with them and not be as distraught as I usually would be, and I’m like “great, I’m fine now,” but then as soon as they leave I’m like okay, time’s up. And calorie allowance is lower now.
